entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a young boy who has been watched by an unknown entity.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Foul creatures that threaten Harry's safety and well-being.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather, a wizard who has been rescued by Harry.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who was killed in the maze last year.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The governing body of the wizarding world.

relationships.description: Harry rescued Sirius from the Ministry.
Cedric was killed in the maze last year, which is a concern for Harry's safety.
The Ministry is involved with Sirius and Cedric's situation.
